Html: I am currently using Prism 4.1 for WPF applications. Where can I find information on the future release plans of Prism?

It is now open source and we are working on a new release called Prism 6. You could move to Prism 5 in the interim.
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dotnet/archive/2015/03/19/prism-grows-up.aspx
http://dotnetrocks.com/default.aspx?showNum=1116
